current.name: CU Reviews
current.description: CU Reviews is a course review website. You can browse classes and view their metrics, read about other students' experiences, and submit your own course reviews for others.
current.productAlt: A laptop next to a phone, displaying the search page and the search results page of the CU Reviews website

current.name: CU Reviews
current.description: CU Reviews is a course review website. You can browse classes and view their metrics, read about other students' experiences, and submit your own course reviews for others.
current.productAlt: A laptop next to a phone, displaying the search page and the search results page of the CU Reviews website

current.name: Course Plan
current.description: Start your college career here with us. CoursePlan has everything you need to fulfill your requirements, all in one place. You can design your 4-year plan by simply dragging them into your schedule.
current.productAlt: A desktop computer next to a laptop, displaying the planning page and the profile page of the Course Plan website

current.name: Queue Me In
current.description: Office hours are too crowded and unorganized. Queue Me In removes the frustration from office hours by helping students get support and professors better understand their classes.
current.productAlt: 2 phones side by side, displaying the list of available consulting hours screen and the join queue screen of the Queue Me In website

current.name: Design @ Cornell
current.description: Design@Cornell is a centralized repository that contains all the resources and information needed for faculty, staff, current and future students interested in design at Cornell.
current.productAlt: A browser displaying the hero section of the Design @ Cornell website

current.name: Zing
current.description: Collaborating with The Learning Strategies Center (LSC) at Cornell, Zing is an all-in-one web interface to create optimal groups for class projects based on students' study preferences.
current.productAlt: A desktop computer next to a tablet, displaying the landing page and questionnaire page of the Zing website

current.name: CU Apts
current.description: The search for off-campus housing in Ithaca is insane. CU Apts helps you search for off-campus housing, share apartment reviews, and explore your best options.
current.productAlt: A laptop next to a phone, displaying home page and an address page of the CU Apts website

upcoming.name: Carriage
upcoming.description:
Carriage is dedicated to making Cornell accessible for all students and work directly with CULift, Cornell's paratransit service for students with disabilities. 
 
 Launching next semester.
upcoming.productAlt: A monitor displaying a blurry screen of the Carriage website with the words Coming Soon overlaid on top

upcoming.name: CornellGo
upcoming.description:
Navigating Campus for the first time is confusing. CornellGO is a scavenger hunt app that makes discovering campus easy and fun through interactive, location-based challenges.  
 
 Launching this semester
upcoming.productAlt: 2 phones side by side, displaying the profile page and map section of the Cornell Go Application
